page.title: 03ROMFORD MARKET
page.content: The market is held on Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday.It is like one large shop but with separate open-air stalls.Most stalls sell food,fruit, vegetables and cloth.Other stalls sell household items and clothes.People like the market because goods are cheaper than at other places.There are real bargains and people haggle over the prices.There are well over 1OO stalls on market days.Also there are 2 other markets:a covered market and an antiques market.The most busy time of year is Christmas,when everybody comes to Romford to buy presents.They come from many parts of south-east England,mainly by special coach,car, bus and train.People who live near Romford usually prefer to walk.
